channel.title: New game development forum: Mopar GameDev
channel.description:
We've discussed it, and here it is. A new community solely targeting Game Development. It's starting small, but we're excited to see where it goes. Post your ideas, suggestions, code, and whatever else pleases you, so long as it is game development.
http://gamedev.moparisthebest.com/smf

item.title: New game development forum: Mopar GameDev

item.title: New game development forum: Mopar GameDev
item.dc:creator: @_s11 s1gma
item.description:
@_s11 wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:181, topic:410557”][quote author=_s link=topic=511841.msg3719979#msg3719979 date=1313874877]
fuck yes

he made us laugh for other reasons

Who are you?

what kind of question is that, have you not seen me before here?

you’re saying “we” as you belong to some association other than moparscape/mitb and putting others down

we = intelligent people who realised that GML was a walkin’ talkin’ pile of donkey shit. evidently you don’t belong to that group of people
[/quote]
Wow, still being a rude nuisance I see.[/quote]
stfu ty

Read full topic
